Clever Websites

Lewis Buckley Development create clever websites. We design & build exceptional digital products. These live as websites but can do so much more than a typical 'website'. They can help you run your business or provide a service to your customers.

Testimonials

- Customer from Southampton, UK

Sectors

We've got experience working in the following sectors:

  • Geo Location / Mapping
  • GPS Tracking
  • Health Care
  • Consumer Startups
  • Bulk Email
  • Storage and Logistics

We use the following tools to help us deliver our projects:

  • Ruby on Rails for complex projects
  • Wordpress for simple websites
  • PHP (Laravel and CodeIgniter)
  • MySQL databases
  • Photoshop (for designs)
  • Swift / Objective C development for iPhone apps
  • Complete set of devices including Windows and Mac computers, iPhones, iPads and Android devices
  • Plus many more, we always use the right tool for the job
